评论详情: The fit is perfect and the style is just adorable! It's also nice and thick and has a good structure to it.

I ordered this hat for my wife.  She loves the little bow detail. It is sewn on nicely to the hat.  The hat is a nicely knit hat and seems durable.  The yarn is not as soft as I expected but it’s comfortable and not itchy to wear.  The beige hat with black bow looks nice.  The hat runs a little on the big side but it still fits nicely.  This hat really helps to keep my wife warm in these midwestern winters.
